price: (24) There will circulate among them [servant] boys [especially] for them, as if they were pearls well-protected.
arabic: ۞ وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيۡهِمۡ غِلۡمَانٞ لَّهُمۡ كَأَنَّهُمۡ لُؤۡلُؤٞ مَّكۡنُونٞ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wayaṭūfu ʿalayhim ghil'mānun lahum ka-annahum lu'lu-on maknūnun
